name: Warlord (itch)
description:
Take back control of your land

Start as a lone soldier and build up your army

Attack areas to buy, upgrade, and sustain your forces to retake your rightful place on the throne

Goal

  • Conquer areas: take over rural farms and town while raising an army
  • Attack farm to increase food production to sustain a growing army
  • Victory will yield cash which can be use in variety of ways
    • Purchase and upgrade buildings to help in your conquest
    • Hiring more soldiers to join your army
  • Take control of the area surrounding the castle, and lay siege to it whenever you feel ready to do so

Control:

  • W-A-S-D: Movement
  • Mouse Wheel: Switch weapons
  • Mouse Left Click: Select (UI) / Attack (Combat)
  • Mouse Right Click: Rotate Camera
  • Escape: Quit

Software:

  • Autodesk Maya 
  • Substance Painter
  • Adobe Photoshop CC
  • Unity 2019
  • Visual Studio
  • GitKraken
  • Audacity
